item.title: Volunteer opportunities still open for TechCrunch Disrupt 2025

item.title: Robomart unveils new delivery robot with $3 flat fee to challenge DoorDash, Uber Eats
item.description: Robomart's RM5 autonomous delivery robot can carry up to 50 pounds and deliver multiple customer orders at once.

item.title: Yottar wants to help energy users find capacity on the electrical grid
item.description: The startup maps utility assets and collects data on electricity demand, which helps customers find locations ripe for upgrades or new equipment.

item.title: Apple might opt for a curved glassed design for 20th anniversary iPhone
item.description: Apple is likely to debut a new curved glass design for the 20th anniversary iPhone in 2027
